channel.title: Voting on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Voting on My blog

item.title: Top vBlog 2016
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: The top vBlog 2016 voting has opened, go forth and vote for your favourites now - There are a lot of them to choose from!

item.title: Rock the Vote 2014
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: Once again, it’s time to vote for the top VMware & virtualization blogs. As usual Eric Siebert has opened up the floodgates and set up a voting system, and once again managed to create a lot of work for himself. So, let’s all make it worth his while and get as many votes in as possible! There are a lot of blogs listed, this time there are over 300 in total.
